text: Talent
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Today's guest is Chiyoko Sonoda!
Hello, everyone!

I'm Chiyoko Sonoda from Houkura,
the chocolate idol!

Today, I hope we can have a thorough and meaningful
discussion without skimping on anything!
Nice to meet you!
Oh, thank you very much!

By the way, Sonoda-san,
is it okay if I call you Choco-chan today?

Yes, please do!
Call me Choco-chan!

Thank you. Well then, let's get started, Choco-chan!
You started right off the bat with a chocolate-related comment!

Among those, "a little bit"
is a phrase I often hear...!
Do you come up with these on your own?
Yes, usually by myself...
The one I use the most is "a little bit".

but for example, when someone says "that's sweet",
I might reply with "just like chocolate!"

Or in hot weather, I might say "melting",
or when trying to sound mature, I might say "bitter".

It varies depending on the situation... Sometimes I think about
them beforehand, and sometimes they just come to me on the spot.
...Honestly, do you ever feel embarrassed doing that?

Huh!?
Wait, are you saying it's like a dad joke!?
No, no, no...!

I didn't mean that,
but since it came from you, Choco-chan...
Oh no, I've dug my own grave...

...I wouldn't feel embarrassed,
if no one pointed it out...
Oh, my bad for bringing it up!
Haha...

...But really, Choco-chan,
you value being a "chocolate idol", right?
Yes!

I'm biased, but the members of Houkura
are a diverse and wonderful group...

Just being Chiyoko Sonoda wouldn't cut it!
So I felt a sense of crisis...
That's when I decided to become a chocolate idol!

Since it's such an important weapon,
I'll cherish it now and forever!

By the way, why did you choose chocolate?
Do you like it more than anything else?
Oh, I do like chocolate, but that's not the reason!

My name is Chiyoko,
and I used to be called "Choco"-

Good job.
You're quite the talker, huh?

Wow, really!?
I did it!
Yeah, you did great.

When you started with "I'm biased but"...
I wasn't sure what you were going to talk about!

Huh?
Wait, are you praising me now? Or teasing me?

Hahaha,
of course I'm praising you!
R-Really...?
